0.1.name: wordpress/swarm-cdn
0.1.description:
Swarm CDN is the first peer-to-peer content delivery network using WebRTC. This WordPress plugin, in conjunction with a Swarm CDN account, will greatly simplify the process of getting Swarm CDN set up on your WordPress site.

Swarm CDN provides a seamless (behind the scenes) real time network of your surfers so that they serve content to each other (and only each other while they’re on your site). For every image that your surfers serve to each other that is content that is not served via your host and therefore you save money. If you’re already using a CDN you can simply add Swarm CDN to your existing CDN.

You can read more extensively about Swarm CDN at our site http://swarmcdn.com

*If you do not load your images from the same domain as your WordPress site you should see the support documents for help at our knowledge base. J
